thread.section_title: Tripbeam.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tripbeam.com | tripbeam.com | 2 of 44
thread.title: Nagesh

author: Nagesh
title: Nagesh
text: Very quick turn around. I just filled the inquiry form online and I quickly received a call by their customer service agent by name Garima Jain who gathered all the right kind of details and provided all the required details to me. She asked all the right questions to gather my specific requirement and flexibility and she helped me get a direct flight with no lay over for the price lower than what other providers are offering an itinerary with one or two stops with layover.
